title: Belgium attacker was a 'radicalized' convict
text:
Belgium attacker was a 'radicalized' convict 9:50am BST - 01:17
Belgian authorities sought to deflect questions on Wednesday over the furlough of a convicted criminal, known to have been radicalized in jail, who killed three people in the Belgian city of Liege. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Belgian authorities sought to deflect questions on Wednesday over the furlough of a convicted criminal, known to have been radicalized in jail, who killed three people in the Belgian city of Liege.
